resources.string: Welcome to OpenPomo, the opensource Android tool that lets you download tickets from a Trac environment, organize them in activities and face them according to the Pomodoro Technique. OpenPomo will automatically collect metrics while you are working. Press the Menu button to access all OpenPomo functionalities. THIS IS ALPHA SOFTWARE: please visit the official site: http://bit.ly/9Oi0Ir for more info and links to documentation. IMPROVE POMODROID! You can help OpenPomo in many ways. See the Project Wiki for info: http://bit.ly/aYyUuO
Tap one of the buttons in order to modify directly db4o database
Click the buttons in order to retrieve tickets from Services.
Welcome. There are no activities stored. \n You may want to add a new activity by pressing the Menu button on your phone. \n You may enable useful features and notifications in Preferences.
No activities stored.\nPress the MENU button to either insert new activities or activate the Quick Insert mode from the preferences.
Use the Menu button to save the preferences.

Welcome to OpenPomo.
 This is the first time that you run the program. Please do the following: 
 
 1) Set a Pomodoro Default length 
 2) Press the Save button 
 3) Add some Services using the second tab.
 4) Press the back button on your phone to start using the program.
Pomodoro finished. Take a short break.
Pomodoro finished. Take a longer break.
No Internet connection active. Please try again when a connection is available.
No Internet connection active. Please try again when a connection is available.

In this window you can retrieve all issues/tickets from your active Services.
Simply press the "Fetch Activities" button.
You can also access the list of services by pressing the Menu button.
Please don't leave this window until all the operations finished.

Thank you for supporting OpenPromo!
